Action.author: scottz
Action.body: In an attempt to stress the fabric layer in previous release, we did a similar test, without the collection name, which did nothing but send serv disc requests repeatedly. Nothing interesting happened there, so I think we can skip this test (which is not a realistic scenario anyways). The PTE code being implemented with FAB-13006 will exercise the relevant node-sdk code of course under normal network scenarios with other sidedb service discovery tests, such as FAB-11447.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Not a normal usecase testcase. And if we did this, it seems it would essentially retest a mechanism that was already tested in previous release with FAB-10581.
